subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. has denied Mississippi quarterback Jeremiah Masoli’s request for a waiver that would allow him to play immediately, meaning that Masoli, a former Oregon standout, will not be eligible until 2011.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. has denied Mississippi quarterback Jeremiah Masoli’s request for a waiver that would allow him to play immediately, meaning that Masoli, a former Oregon standout, will not be eligible until 2011.
